title: 3 and Out - NFL Camp Underdogs, Major Dak Health Red Flags, Tua Decision Time, Hurry Up Headlines, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - NFL Camp Underdogs, Major Dak Health Red Flags, Tua Decision Time, Hurry Up Headlines, Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why the NFL is the ultimate level playing field for late round/undrafted underdogs, why he sees major red flags with Dak Prescott's health based on the season premiere of Hard Knocks, why the Dolphins can't run from Tua being a bust, why Urban Meyer should name Trevor Lawrence the starter today, and quick takes on the other top headlines from the week. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
